languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, надеюсь, нет необходимости просить вас впредь не распространять опасные и недостоверные слухи, а равно и детали нашей беседы? В сложившейся ситуации я буду расценивать это как подрывную деятельность, посему заранее благодарю вас за понимающее молчание".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, надеюсь, нет необходимости просить вас впредь не распространять опасные и недостоверные слухи, а равно и детали нашей беседы? В сложившейся ситуации я буду расценивать это как подрывную деятельность, посему заранее благодарю вас за понимающее молчание".

Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the contents of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

languages.text: 「陛下、今後は危険かつ誤解を招くような噂は流さないでいただけると助かります。そして、此度の会話の内容もご内密に。現在の状況を鑑みれば、そのような行動は一種の破壊であるとみなさざるを得ない。熟慮のうえで沈黙を守っていただけること、前もって感謝いたしますよ」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、今後は危険かつ誤解を招くような噂は流さないでいただけると助かります。そして、此度の会話の内容もご内密に。現在の状況を鑑みれば、そのような行動は一種の破壊であるとみなさざるを得ない。熟慮のうえで沈黙を守っていただけること、前もって感謝いたしますよ」

languages.text: “大人，我希望你不要传播带有误导性的危险谣言，对此次谈话内容保密，这一点相信你一定很清楚。考虑到目前的情况，若是真的发生了谣言事件，恐怕我将不得不将其视为颠覆帝国的罪行。因此，我希望能提前感谢你对此事保持缄默。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我希望你不要传播带有误导性的危险谣言，对此次谈话内容保密，这一点相信你一定很清楚。考虑到目前的情况，若是真的发生了谣言事件，恐怕我将不得不将其视为颠覆帝国的罪行。因此，我希望能提前感谢你对此事保持缄默。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'espère qu'il va sans dire que j'aimerais que vous évitiez de répandre de dangereuses rumeurs à l'avenir... et que vous gardiez pour vous la teneur de cette conversation. Au vu de l'état actuel des choses, je me verrais dans l'obligation de considérer de telles actions comme subversives. Je vous remercie donc par avance de votre silence. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'espère qu'il va sans dire que j'aimerais que vous évitiez de répandre de dangereuses rumeurs à l'avenir... et que vous gardiez pour vous la teneur de cette conversation. Au vu de l'état actuel des choses, je me verrais dans l'obligation de considérer de telles actions comme subversives. Je vous remercie donc par avance de votre silence. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, espero que no haga falta que le diga que agradecería que no propague rumores peligrosos y engañosos en lo sucesivo y que guarde en secreto el contenido de esta conversación. Dadas las circunstancias actuales, tendría que tratar tales acciones como un intento de subversión, por lo que le agradezco por adelantado su discreción y silencio».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, espero que no haga falta que le diga que agradecería que no propague rumores peligrosos y engañosos en lo sucesivo y que guarde en secreto el contenido de esta conversación. Dadas las circunstancias actuales, tendría que tratar tales acciones como un intento de subversión, por lo que le agradezco por adelantado su discreción y silencio».

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich hoffe, es versteht sich von selbst, dass ich es begrüßen würde, wenn Ihr in Zukunft keine gefährlichen und irreführenden Gerüchte verbreiten würdet ... und den Inhalt dieser Unterhaltung für Euch behaltet. Angesichts der Umstände müsste ich alles andere als subversiv betrachten. Insofern danke ich Euch schon im Voraus für Eure Verschwiegenheit."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich hoffe, es versteht sich von selbst, dass ich es begrüßen würde, wenn Ihr in Zukunft keine gefährlichen und irreführenden Gerüchte verbreiten würdet ... und den Inhalt dieser Unterhaltung für Euch behaltet. Angesichts der Umstände müsste ich alles andere als subversiv betrachten. Insofern danke ich Euch schon im Voraus für Eure Verschwiegenheit.

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri; söylememe lüzum olmasa da bundan böyle tehlikeli ve asılsız söylentiler yaymamanı, bu konuşmamızın içeriğini de kendine saklamanı istiyorum. Güncel vaziyete bakıldığında bu hareketleri baltalayıcı sıfatıyla değerlendirmek durumundayım. Anlayışlı sükûnetin için şimdiden teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I hope it goes without saying that I would appreciate you not spreading dangerous and misleading rumours going forward — and keeping the content of this conversation private. Given the current state of affairs, I would have to treat such actions as subversive, so I thank you in advance for your considerate silence."
